name: Dice N Pass ( GMTK Game Jam )
name_original: Dice N Pass ( GMTK Game Jam )
description:
Dice N Pass is a short yet addicting puzzle platformer game.

You have to complete the so called impossible levels by using the Dice of Luck and moving the golden tiles.

The number you get on your dice is the amount of golden tiles you can move, for example if you get a 2 on your dice then you can move 2 tile's to use as platforms and pass the level. You can also move some Enemy's !

Controls:

A / D to move

Spacebar to jump

Click the Roll Button to roll the dice

(There is also a Tutorial Level :D)

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice
